arts.ttl: The huge headache Pep Guardiola has despite Wolves rout - and why there is no easy fix, writes JACK GAUGHAN
arts.sum: JACK GAUGHAN: The away section were singing about how 'City are back' as they witnessed Tijjani Reijnders tear up Molineux on Premier League debut.

arts.ttl: Five things learned in Manchester City’s win at Wolves as Oscar Bobb returns and James Trafford shines - opinion
arts.sum: Guardiola is looking up for the fight this year...

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola admits fears over Man City squad as he sounds warning to club chiefs despite 4-0 win over Wolves
arts.sum: JACK GAUGHAN: Guardiola, who saw Haaland score a brace as they beat Wolves, fears that the backroom staff will struggle to keep players together in unison without a raft of departures.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola singles out ‘unbelievable’ Man City player after Wolves win, it’s not Tijjani Reijnders
arts.sum: Oscar Bobb surely deserves a mention, too...

arts.ttl: Wolves 0-4 Man City: Reijnders dream debut helps City cruise past Wolves
arts.sum: New signing Tijjani Reijnders played a part in three goals on his Premier League debut to help Manchester City start the 2025/26 campaign flawlessly against Wolves at Molineux. Reijnders added to Erling Haaland’s 34th-minute opener when he scored on his league debut with a clinical, left-footed finish from just inside the box.

arts.ttl: Manchester City 4 Wolves 0: City player ratings from Molineux
arts.sum: A brace from Erling Haaland and goals from Tijjani Reijnders and Rayan Cherki were enough for Pep Guardiola’s side to begin the new season in dominant fashion. Manchester City (Erling Haaland 34′ 61′, Tijjani Reijnders 37′, Rayan Cherki 81′)

arts.ttl: Haaland & Reijnders star as Man City overpower Wolves
arts.sum: Erling Haaland picks up where he left off last season scoring twice while new signing Tijani Reijnders also impresses as Manchester City comfortably beat Wolves 4-0 win in the Premier League at Molineux.

arts.ttl: Reijnders runs Wolves ragged as Man City surge to opening Premier League victory
arts.sum: Manchester City make a serious statement of title intent as they thump Wolverhampton Wanderers 4-0 at Molineux on the opening weekend of the Premier League season.

arts.ttl: Manchester City 4 Wolves 0: Match report from Molineux.
arts.sum: Erling Haaland gives Manchester City the lead after a superb piece of play from Tijjani Reijnders. Manchester City 4 (Erling Haaland 34′, 61, Tijjani Reijnders 37′, Rayan Cherki 81′)

arts.ttl: Wolves 0-4 Man City: Tijjani Reijnders and Rayan Cherki hit debut goals in emphatic opener
arts.sum: A resounding victory for Guardiola and co
